juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   White sofa with patterned pillows (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Black arched floor lamp (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Wall-mounted flat-screen TV (as seen in Figure 1)
*   White media console below the TV (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Large window with sheer white curtains (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Exterior building view through the window (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Large light-colored area rug (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Light-colored hard floor (as seen in Figure 1)
*   White walls of the living room (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Ceiling with black linear track lighting (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Ceiling with recessed spotlights (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Ceiling with four small rectangular lights above the window (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Two small black circular ceiling fixtures (as seen in Figure 1)
*   Round, light-colored, two-tiered coffee table (from Figure 2)
*   Round robotic vacuum cleaner unit (from Figure 3)
*   White robotic vacuum cleaner docking station (from Figure 3)
